sources.title: I Believe In You
sources.description: Cecil Parker, Celia Johnson, Harry Fowler and Joan Collins star in the story of an unlucky girl, a troubled young man and their sympathetic probation officers.

sources.title: I'll Get You (1952) GEORGE RAFT üçïCOLD WAR THRILLER
sources.description:
It's Friday@PizzaFLIX 
Starring: George Raft, Sally Gray, Clifford Evans
Directed by: Seymour Friedman
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLmHgXUJMN1TXEBMtSqYpWfok-xg95KXao
Legendary tough-guy George Raft takes the lead in this Cold War spy thriller from Lippert Pictures. Known for his iconic roles in gangster classics, Raft stars as U.S. agent Steve Rossi, a man on a mission to infiltrate a Soviet spy ring threatening national security. Directed by Seymour Friedman, this suspense-filled tale blends cloak-and-dagger intrigue with Raft‚Äôs signature screen presence.

Set against the backdrop of post-war London, the film pairs Raft with British actress Sally Gray, whose character adds layers of mystery and allure. Clifford Evans delivers a sharp performance as a key player in the international conspiracy. Shot on location in the U.K., the film combines British noir atmosphere with classic Hollywood pacing, offering Raft fans a unique entry in his storied career.

Are you a PizzaFLIX Fanatic? Join our exclusive Fan Club for dedicated Classic movie lovers: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCE34fwgW7kWr7tc7YiOWtRw/join

üçï Be sure to LIKE, COMMENT, and SUBSCRIBE for more rare, vintage films every Friday on PizzaFLIX.

Whether you're a longtime admirer of George Raft or a fan of vintage espionage cinema, this taut thriller showcases the star in one of his later roles‚Äîcool, calculating, and unshakably charismatic.

üé¨ Hit like and subscribe for more spotlights on Hollywood legends and forgotten gems!

metadata.Plot: After leading nuclear scientists are kidnapped and smuggled behind the Iron Curtain, an FBI man and a British agent are assigned to catch the kidnappers.
metadata.Actors: George Raft, Sally Gray, Clifford Evans
